name: Spelljammer Test
canon_summary: **Time vs. choice:** seeing the future is not the same as controlling it.
**Identity & memory:** what happens when “you” is a record that can be replayed, edited, or stolen.
There’s an old, cosmic system tied to **Star Seeds**, **Vault Mechanisms**, and **Incarnates**. “Opening the way” (like the Infinite Staircase door) can trigger world-scale consequences.

The Solstice Pact is an Astral Elf offshoot, but the PCs have tangled with Astral Elf military pressure more than once. Astral Elves have the reach, discipline, and resources to make problems “follow” the party across ports and planes.

**Temporal Guardians:** awakened modron-linked secret society, operating out of **Fortress Epoch** (out of phase). “Watch, record, intervene rarely.” They fear manufactured glyph births and hollow Incarnates.
